title: Filmmaker Portfolio
description: I recently developed a website for a client who is a filmmaker and photographer. The website showcases his works and serves as a portfolio for his clients to view. Additionally, I also built a dashboard for him where he can upload and manage his works efficiently. For the backend of the website, I utilized Firebase, which provides a robust and scalable solution for storing and retrieving data. I am proud of the end result and my client is very satisfied with the functionality and design of the website. I am eager to continue building upon my skills and create more dynamic and user-friendly websites for clients in the future.

title: Store Cash On Delivery With Admin Dashboard
description: I built a website to practice my skills in Redux and Firebase. The website features a simple design and is structured as a cash on delivery platform. This project allowed me to enhance my knowledge of these technologies and improve my web development abilities.
nothing: I developed a website for my friends to sell local products with a cash on delivery option. The website features a simple design and a dashboard for product management, powered by Firebase backend and Redux state management. My friends are satisfied with the website s functionality and performance, and I am proud of my work on this project

title: My movie list
description: This website allows you to create a list of movies you have watched or plan to watch in the future

title: Grid Portfolio
description: This is my first portfolio, built using a grid system and animated with Framer Motion.

title: Landing page
description: I created my first website using React JS, specifically for a local digital marketing agency.
